parameters.param:
# D E P L O Y K U B E R N E T E S # Deploy the image to the Kubernetes namespace # # - define variables for deployment export NAMESPACE="neocom-%env.ENVIRONMENT%" export APP_CODE="%env.APP_CODE%" export ENV="%env.ENVIRONMENT%" export MODULE_NAME="%env.PROJECT_NAME%" export PORT=%env.PORT% export IMAGE_NAME=$MODULE_NAME export VERSION=`gitversion /showvariable AssemblySemFileVer` export IMAGE_TAG=$IMAGE_NAME:$VERSION export DEPLOY_DIR=%teamcity.build.checkoutDir%/%env.PROJECT_NAME%/.deploy
# - config map contents export LOGIN_LINK="http://localhost:32000/app/loginValidation" echo "##teamcity[setParameter name='_NEOCOM.LOGIN_LINK' value='$LOGIN_LINK']"
echo "##teamcity[setParameter name='_NEOCOM.APP_CODE' value='$APP_CODE']" echo "##teamcity[setParameter name='_NEOCOM.ENV' value='$ENV']" echo "##teamcity[setParameter name='_NEOCOM.NAMESPACE' value='$NAMESPACE']" echo "##teamcity[setParameter name='_NEOCOM.MODULE_NAME' value='$MODULE_NAME']" echo "##teamcity[setParameter name='_NEOCOM.PORT' value='$PORT']" echo "##teamcity[setParameter name='_NEOCOM.IMAGE_NAME' value='$IMAGE_NAME']" echo "##teamcity[setParameter name='_NEOCOM.VERSION' value='$VERSION']" echo "##teamcity[setParameter name='_NEOCOM.IMAGE_TAG' value='$IMAGE_TAG']" echo "##teamcity[setParameter name='_NEOCOM.DEPLOY_DIR' value='$DEPLOY_DIR']"
cat $DEPLOY_DIR/deployment.template.yaml | envsubst > $DEPLOY_DIR/deployment.yaml kubectl apply -f $DEPLOY_DIR/deployment.yaml
